author: COMSOL
description:
The design of an organ pipe depends on the pipe radius and length, the material, and wall thickness.

In this example, the quarter-wave resonance frequency of the pipe is found and the frequency response including harmonics is determined. In the app version of this model it is possible to play and listen to the sound produced by a given design, illustrating some of the added functionality of the Application Builder.
label: organ_pipe_design.mph
name: root
